short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool that allows you to check the weather in cities around the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check the weather in your city or any city around the world. Background images are from the local area.

- Updated the way search functions to include local imagery.
- Corrected a display error that caused the extension to load in a narrow layout making it unusable.
